Class HelpFormatter.Section

java.lang.Object
com.scivicslab.pluggablecli.HelpFormatter.Section
Enclosing class:
HelpFormatter
public static final class HelpFormatter.Section extends Object
Immutable section descriptor rendered by this formatter.

    Class
    Description

    HelpFormatter.Section.Kind
    Section kinds supported by the formatter.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static HelpFormatter.Section
    commandDescription(String heading)
    Creates a section that prints the command description registered in the repository.
    static HelpFormatter.Section
    custom(String heading, Collection<String> lines)
    Creates an arbitrary custom section with caller-defined content lines.
    static HelpFormatter.Section
    options(String heading)
    Creates an options section that reuses HelpFormatter.printOptions(PrintWriter, int, Options, int, int) for rendering.
    static HelpFormatter.Section
    usage(String heading)
    Creates a usage section that will be populated via HelpFormatter.printUsage(PrintWriter, int, String).

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • usage

      public static HelpFormatter.Section usage(String heading)
      Creates a usage section that will be populated via HelpFormatter.printUsage(PrintWriter, int, String).
      Parameters:
      heading - heading label to print before the generated usage text
      Returns:
      usage section descriptor

    • options

      public static HelpFormatter.Section options(String heading)
      Creates an options section that reuses HelpFormatter.printOptions(PrintWriter, int, Options, int, int) for rendering.
      Parameters:
      heading - heading label to print above the options table
      Returns:
      options section descriptor

    • commandDescription

      public static HelpFormatter.Section commandDescription(String heading)
      Creates a section that prints the command description registered in the repository.
      Parameters:
      heading - heading label to print
      Returns:
      description section descriptor

    • custom

      public static HelpFormatter.Section custom(String heading, Collection<String> lines)
      Creates an arbitrary custom section with caller-defined content lines.
      Parameters:
      heading - heading label to print (may be null to suppress the heading)
      lines - content lines; each element can contain embedded newlines
      Returns:
      custom section descriptor
